agent: Hello, Good day, welcome to Solid Insurance customer service.
May I know your name please? How can we help you?
Oh mister Stephen, welcome once again.
customer: I would like to cancel my insurance plan.

agent: Hope no problem sir? We can surely help to rectify any issue you might be facing.
customer: Not really, I don't want to go into details for now.

agent: Okay, we are always ready to serve you better.
customer: Thank you, I actually tried to find the cancel plan button on your website but couldn't find any. I guess I have to make a phone call to cancel it.

agent: Sure thing, we can help with that.
Can I have your first name and last name please.
Ok, Stephen.
Ok, so we have here Stephen James.
Thats good. Do you have your policy number there with you mister Stephen?
Yes mister Stephen, To cancel your plan successfully, I need to have your policy number. You can find this number on your account page in our website.
customer: m oK, give a moment please, let me look for it.

agent: Take your time please.
customer: Policy number, you mean... the string of number below my profile picture?

agent: Yes please. Could you read it?
five eight nine.
seven zero two.
You mean three three two.
Ok, three three three.
So, for the policy number we have five eight nine seven zero two three three three.
Perfect, Now may I have your address and zip code too?
customer: My address is five forty, rangeline mobile Ak.

agent: Ok, five forty, rangeline mobile AK.
The zip code please.
three five nine.
one six.
Ok. Three five nine one six.
Next we need your date of birth.
customer: Ok, September, sixteen nineteen seventy four.

agent: September sixteen, nineteen seventy four.
Ok, from what I have on your dashboard, you have two insurance policy under our company.
customer: Yes, I know, Automobile policy and Life insurance.

agent: So, which plan would you like to cancel from the two.
customer: I will like to cancel the life insurance policy for now.

agent: Ok.
customer: I will also like to ask, can I enrol back anytime I'm ready.

agent: Yes you can mister Stephen.
Thanks for the information sir, I will go ahead and cancel your plan.
customer: Ok thanks, please when will the cancellation take effect.

agent: It will take effect from the first day of next month, you wouldn't be billed from now till that time.
Do you confirm the cancellation?
customer: Yes I confirm to cancel it.

agent: Ok, please hold on for a while, I will proceed to cancel your plan.
Okay done. Your plan is now canceled.
customer: Thanks m. Thanks for your help.

agent: You are welcome, Is there any other thing you would like us to do for you.
